message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a limited time at a price of $12,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $9,500 for it. Let me know if this is something we can work with.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate you recognizing the product's value. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $9,500 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still not able to meet at $11,000. My maximum offer is $10,500. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
